data.name: I’m going to die if I don’t eat sushi!
data.detailed_description:
"Hey, hey, hey, what the heck! The sushi is too good!"

If you don't keep eating sushi, you will die! This 3D action game takes the main character on a great adventure to fight the evil that is trying to erase sushi from the world!

Use your jumping action and love for sushi to conquer a total of 40 different 3D courses!

Game Features:
  • Collect "Sushi Souls" which you get by clearing stages!
  • Many scenario cutscenes. An epic battle between those who love sushi and those who hate sushi is depicted.
  • Several types of "jump skills" exist to enhance the main character's actions and increase the freedom of game attack.

data.short_description: If you don't keep eating sushi, you'll die! A 3D action game in which such a hero makes a big adventure! Fight the evil that attempts to erase sushi from the world!
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, French, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 OR AMD RX 5500 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 OR AMD RX 5600 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
